amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Mr. Young (FL) raised a point of order against the Obey amendment (A001). Mr. Young (FL) stated that the amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Obey.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Obey.
